TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressUnmanagedCodeSecurityAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允許 Managed 程式碼不經過堆疊查核行程即呼叫 Unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: Allows managed code to call into unmanaged code without a stack walk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 您可以使用這個屬性，必須特別小心。Use this attribute with extreme care. 使用不正確造成安全性弱點。Incorrect use can create security weaknesses. 這個屬性可以套用至想要呼叫原生程式碼而不需要這麼做時，會造成效能損失，在執行階段安全性檢查的方法。This attribute can be applied to methods that want to call into native code without incurring the performance loss of a run-time security check when doing so. 執行在執行階段，省略呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼時導致效能大幅節省堆疊查核行程。The stack walk performed when calling unmanaged code is omitted at run time, resulting in substantial performance savings. 在類別中使用這個屬性套用至所有包含的方法。Using this attribute in a class applies it to all contained methods. 一般而言，每當 managed 程式碼呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼 （由原生程式碼 PInvoke 或 COM interop)，沒有要求`UnmanagedCode`權限，以確保所有呼叫端具有必要的權限，允許此。Generally, whenever managed code calls into unmanaged code (by PInvoke or COM interop into native code), there is a demand for the `UnmanagedCode` permission to ensure all callers have the necessary permission to allow this. 開發人員可以藉由套用此明確的屬性，來隱藏在執行階段的需求。By applying this explicit attribute, developers can suppress the demand at run time. 開發人員必須負責確保轉換至 unmanaged 程式碼受到充分保護透過其他方式。The developer must take responsibility for assuring that the transition into unmanaged code is sufficiently protected by other means. 需求`UnmanagedCode`在連結時，還是會發生權限。The demand for the `UnmanagedCode` permission will still occur at link time. 例如，如果函式的呼叫函式 B 和函式 B 會標示，函式會檢查的 unmanaged 程式碼權限在 just-in-time 編譯期間，但不是後續在執行階段。For example, if function A calls function B and function B is marked with , function A will be checked for unmanaged code permission during just-in-time compilation, but not subsequently during run time. 這個屬性才有效時套用至 PInvoke 方法 （或包含 PInvoke 方法的類別） 或將透過它進行 interop 呼叫介面的定義。This attribute is only effective when applied to PInvoke methods (or classes that contain PInvoke methods) or the definition of an interface through which interop calls will be made. 在所有其他內容，將忽略它。It will be ignored in all other contexts. 這個屬性可用於實作的類別，可讓您透過 unmanaged 程式碼的系統資源的存取。This attribute is useful for implementing a class that provides access to system resources through unmanaged code. 沒有存取 unmanaged 程式碼的權限的程式碼可以呼叫具有此屬性來存取 unmanaged 程式碼的類別。Code that does not have permission to access unmanaged code can call a class with this attribute to access unmanaged code. 這只是安全，如果具有此屬性之類別的寫入器已設計為安全的類別。This is only safe if the writer of the class with this attribute has programmed the class to be secure. 如果沒有，此屬性非常危險，並且可以允許使用被誤用的程式碼。If not, this attribute is dangerous and can allow the code that uses it to be misused. 這不是宣告式安全性屬性，但一般屬性 (它衍生自，而非)。This is not a declarative security attribute, but a regular attribute (it derives from , not ).

related.span: 使用屬性擴充中繼資料

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會將所有的欄位初始化成為其預設值。The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values.
